text: John Brown (born 26 January 1962) is a Scottish former professional footballer who also worked as a manager. Brown played for Hamilton Academical, Dundee and Rangers, mostly as a central defender but also as a left full-back or defensive midfielder. ==Managerial statistics== Team Nat From To Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Team Nat From To G W D L GF GA GD Win % Clyde 26 January 2008 21 November 2009 Dundee 23 February 2013 3 February 2014 Total Total Total Total ==Honours== ===Player=== Rangers *Scottish Premier Division (8): 1988–89, 1989–90, 1990–91, 1991–92, 1992–93, 1993–94, 1994–95, 1995–96 *Scottish Cup: 1991–92, 1992–93, 1995–96 *Scottish League Cup: 1988–89, 1990–91, 1992–93 ===Manager=== ;Clyde * Scottish First Division play-off 2007–08 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish football managers Category:Footballers from Stirling
title: John Brown (football player)
